content: 5 cm cast off the middle 24 sts and work the shoulders 17 sts each separately on the next row cast off 2 sts on the neck side and continue straight until the work measures 27 cm leave the remaining shoulder stitches on a thread 15 sts and work the other shoulder in the same way but mirrored front continue working stripes over the 28 front stitches until the work measures 21 5 cm slip 7 sts on a thread for the neck shape neck every 2 row by casting off 2 sts twice then casting off 1 st twice continue straight over the remaining 15 sts until the work measures 27 cm leave the remaining stitches on a thread and work the other front in the same way but mirrored using 3 5 mm needles and background colour knit together the shoulder seams casting off at the same time sleeve worked back and forth using 3 mm needles and contrast colour cast on 38 sts work 1 row of 1x1 rib p1 k1 change to background colour and continue working rib as before until the sleeve measures 3 5 cm change to 3 5 mm needles and st st and work stripes starting with 2 r of contrast at the same time increase 1 st at the beginning and 1 st at the end on the 5th and every subsequent 6th row until there are 54 sts on the needle continue without further increases until the sleeve measures 18 cm cast off neck fasten loose ends round the neck area using 3 mm needle and background colour pick up sts round the neck
